book.synopsis: A renowned scientist examines the less than two percent of human genes that distinguish us from chimpanzees and that link human behaviors--such as genocide, drug addiction, and the extermination of other species--to our animal predecessors
book.title_long: The Third Chimpanzee: The Evolution and Future of the Human Animal
book.dimensions: Height: 9.4 Inches, Length: 1.4 Inches, Weight: 1.65 Pounds, Width: 6.4 Inches
